personal.name: Mahadev
personal.tagline: Building logical, scalable, real-world software solutions.

about.description: I am a student developer focused on building practical software solutions. I work mainly with Java, Android, and web technologies, and I enjoy solving logical problems and understanding how systems work end-to-end. My approach is to learn by building real applications that solve actual problems, with a focus on clean architecture and maintainable code.

projects.title: Campus Timetable Management System
projects.description: A role-based timetable and invigilation management system designed for a college environment, consisting of two Android applications and one web dashboard.

studentApp.name: Student Android App
points: Developed an Android application for students to view class timetables in real time
Implemented editable timetable cells, subject dialogs, and customizable UI themes
Added JSON import/export functionality and persistent storage using SharedPreferences
Used by 50+ students, reducing manual timetable handling by approximately 70%

facultyApp.name: Faculty Android App
points: Built a faculty-specific Android app to manage personal timetables and invigilation schedules
Implemented faculty ID–based subject mapping supporting multiple subjects and lab sessions per faculty
Ensured accurate synchronization of schedules across classes and departments

adminDashboard.name: Admin / Timetable Designer Web Dashboard
points: Developed a web interface for course mapping, faculty assignment, and timetable design
Implemented lab span logic, lunch-break validation, conflict detection, and multi-faculty subject handling
Optimized performance using progressive data loading for large datasets

projects.title: To-Do List Web Application
projects.description: A responsive task management web application with component-based architecture.
features: Task creation with title and description
Responsive UI built with reusable components

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.description: A two-player interactive Tic Tac Toe game implemented for both desktop and web environments.
features: Tested by over 20 users for usability and correctness

projects.title: Universal Unit Converter
projects.description: A GUI-based unit conversion tool supporting a wide range of unit categories.
features: Supports 250+ unit types across multiple categories
Improved conversion efficiency compared to manual calculations
